about_the_game:
Suika Pets brings a fresh dose of adorable to the familiar Suika genre of puzzle games! The cute combo building puzzle game that will have you hooked for hours of play! Suika Pets is the casual distraction that will quickly become your new obsession!

Key Features:

Match and Merge Your Pets:
Combine cute and lovable pets to grow bigger and bigger pets unlocking whole new levels of cuteness!

Chase High Scores:
Enjoy going for high scores merging your pets for an extra layer of fun and competition!

A Variety of Pets and Animals:
Play with a huge range of adorable pets and animals, adding an extra layer of adorable to the game!

More Strategic Gameplay:
Adding to the Suika genre with increased ability to plan your moves more carefully to create more pet combinations!

Unlockable Themes and Styles:
Customize your game with a variety of cute unlockable themes and styles!

Addictive Gameplay:
Engaging and addictive gameplay providing hours of fun that will keep you coming back for one more game!
